message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I think you'd be very interested in.  I'm offering it to you for $14,000. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your product and would like to make a counteroffer of $12,000.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm not quite there yet.  $13,000 is the best I can do right now.  Let's see if we can bridge the gap.
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I would like to counter with $12,500.
Bob,  I'm coming down to $13,000. That's really the best I can do, given the value of this product. I'm hoping we can finally reach an agreement.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility. I am willing to pay $12,800 for the product.
